sn19.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn19.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca lakkhano ayasma ca mahamoggallano gijjhakute pabbate viharanti.
sn19.1:1.4: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yenayasma lakkhano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam lakkhanam etadavoca:
sn19.1:1.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma lakkhano ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosi.
sn19.1:1.7: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto annatarasmim padese sitam patvakasi.
sn19.1:1.8: Atha kho ayasma lakkhano ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
sn19.1:1.9: “ko nu kho, avuso moggallana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa patukammaya”ti?
sn19.1:1.11: Bhagavato mam santike etam panham puccha”ti.
sn19.1:2.1: Atha kho ayasma ca lakkhano ayasma ca mahamoggallano rajagahe pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma lakkhano ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
sn19.1:2.2: “idhayasma mahamoggallano gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto annatarasmim padese sitam patvakasi.
sn19.1:2.3: Ko nu kho, avuso moggallana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa patukammaya”ti?
sn19.1:3.1: “Idhaham, avuso, gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasam atthikasankhalikam vehasam gacchantim.
sn19.1:3.2: Tamenam gijjhapi kakapi kulalapi anupatitva anupatitva phasulantarikahi vitudenti vitacchenti virajenti.
sn19.1:4.3: nanabhuta vata, bhikkhave, savaka viharanti, yatra hi nama savako evarupam nassati va dakkhati va sakkhim va karissati.
sn19.1:4.4: Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto dittho ahosi, api caham na byakasim.
sn19.1:4.5: Ahancetam byakareyyam, pare ca me na saddaheyyum.
sn19.1:4.6: Ye me na saddaheyyum, tesam tam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
sn19.1:4.7: Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmimyeva rajagahe goghatako ahosi.
sn19.1:4.8: So tassa kammassa vipakena bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani bahuni vassasatasahassani niraye paccitva tasseva kammassa vipakavasesena evarupam attabhavapatilabham patisamvedayati”ti.
